name: Eddie Got A Gun
description:
Eddie is an inventor and loves guns so much. His dream was to make an interdimensional gun that could bring him to another dimension.  After a lot of  unseccessful attempts, he finally got a solution to make the gun work. Eddie was sent to a blocky dimension named Blocktopia that had been conquered by evil. It is Eddie's duty to stop the Evil-Blocks and  save Blocktopia before evilness spreads to Eddie's home dimension. The Earth.

What's new in v2.5 ?

  • New beautifully-designed UI (this time for real)

- New level preview pane so you can preview what level you are going to play.

- New main menu display

- New Pause/Win/Lose panel layout 

  • Fixed bugs
